comments: As a coach, I can say that since I work with assistant manager the team has reached another level
Assistant manager has completely changed the training sessions, I can review everything and act like I was in different places at the same time.
As a coach I always had trouble managing the team when someone from the staff could not come, from the application I can manage training on my own and see the evolution of the players
I can directly send the tasks that the players must do, after I review the training
My training and my players have reached an incredible level and there are a lot of things that have changed

I can directly send the tasks that the players must do, after I review the training
